prereq.p: You'll need access to a kitchen for this, including:

step.cmd: Soak the chicken in 1 3/4 cups of buttermilk
Mix together flour, salt, paprika, pepper, thyme, and cayenne in a large bowl and stir
Mix together remaining 1/4 cup of buttermilk and milk in a small bowl
Pour milk mixture into flour mixture bowl
Mix with a fork until uniform texture
step.info: This will more evenly coat the chicken

step.cmd: Coat the chicken pieces in buttermilk / flour mixture evenly
Fry the chicken in the oil for 5 minutes per side, or until golden brown and crispy
Transfer fried chicken to a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes
step.info: This is to ensure the chicken is fully cooked throughout
